name: mindx-engineer
description: MindX Engineer Onboarding - Week 1: Full-Stack App on Azure AKS

scripts.install:all: npm run api:install && npm run web:install
scripts.dev:all: npm run api:dev & npm run web:dev
scripts.build:all: npm run api:build && npm run web:build
scripts.docker:build: npm run api:docker:build && npm run web:docker:build
scripts.docker:build:prod: docker build -t mindx-api:latest apps/api && docker build -t mindx-web:latest apps/web
